Optimizers¶

This module contains all the optimizers that are implemented in the API.

class optimizers.GradientDescent.GradientDescent(learning_rate=0.001)[source]¶

Implements the classic Gradient Descent (GD) optimization algorithm.

This class inherits from the base Optimizer class and implements the parameter update logic following the classic formula: θ_new = θ_old - α * ∇J(θ)

lr¶

The learning rate (α) used for the parameter updates.

Type:

float

step(params, grads)[source]¶

Performs a single optimization step for all parameters.

Parameters:

  • params (list) – A list of lists containing the model’s parameters. Expected structure: [[weights1, biases1], [weights2, biases2], …]

  • grads (list) – A list of lists containing the gradients for each parameter, with the same structure as params.
